L7p:Document.stringValue: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <s:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.xignite.com/services/5" xmlns:http="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/http/" xmlns:mime="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/mime/" xmlns:s="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:soapenc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:tm="http://microsoft.com/wsdl/mime/textMatching/" xmlns:tns="http://www.xignite.com/services/5" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"> <s:simpleType name="CriteriaTypes"> <s:restriction base="s:string"> <s:enumeration value="Region"/> <s:enumeration value="Division"/> <s:enumeration value="SubDivision"/> <s:enumeration value="City"/> <s:enumeration value="Source"/> <s:enumeration value="Language"/> </s:restriction> </s:simpleType> <s:element name="GetCriteriaResponse"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="GetCriteriaResult" type="tns:Criteria"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:complexType name="Criteria"> <s:complexContent mixed="false"> <s:extension base="tns:Common"> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Type" type="s:string"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="CriteriaCollection" type="tns:ArrayOfCriterion"/> </s:sequence> </s:extension> </s:complexContent> </s:complexType> <s:complexType name="Common"> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="Outcome" type="tns:OutcomeTypes"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Message" type="s:string"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Identity" type="s:string"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="Delay" type="s:double"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:simpleType name="OutcomeTypes"> <s:restriction base="s:string"> <s:enumeration value="Success"/> <s:enumeration value="SystemError"/> <s:enumeration value="RequestError"/> <s:enumeration value="RegistrationError"/> <s:enumeration value="Failure"/> </s:restriction> </s:simpleType> <s:complexType name="ArrayOfCriterion"> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Criterion" nillable="true" type="tns:Criterion"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:complexType name="Criterion"> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Name" type="s:string"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="Count" type="s:int"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:element name="Header" type="tns:Header"/> <s:complexType name="Header"> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Username" type="s:string"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Password" type="s:string"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Tracer" type="s:string"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:element name="GetStatisticsResponse"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="GetStatisticsResult" type="tns:Statistics"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:complexType name="Statistics"> <s:complexContent mixed="false"> <s:extension base="tns:Common"> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="StatisticCollection" type="tns:ArrayOfStatistic"/> </s:sequence> </s:extension> </s:complexContent> </s:complexType> <s:complexType name="ArrayOfStatistic"> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Statistic" nillable="true" type="tns:Statistic"/> type="s:string"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="Count" type="s:int"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:element name="GetArticleResponse"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="PublishDate" type="s:string"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Region" type="s:string"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Division" name="Abstract" nillable="true" type="tns:Abstract"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:complexType name="Abstract"> <s:complexContent mixed="false"> <s:extension base="tns:Common"> <s:sequence> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Categories" type="tns:ArrayOfCategory"/> </s:sequence> </s:extension> </s:complexContent> </s:complexType> <s:complexType
